Text:
Mitsugoshi is also running a large-scale campaign,
but Valentine's customs are catching on regardless
of social rank.
Damn it!
I-I've just used a rather crass word... Oh dear...

I blame it all on what I saw this afternoon. Thinking
back on it really makes my blood boil!

I hear Valentine's customs are catching on with
the public. Women gift chocolate to the one they
admire and confess their love.

Actually, here are some chocolates for you that I
happened to get hold of.

Now, don't get the wrong idea. I didn't know what to
do with them, so it's no big deal.

If I give them to someone else and people start
talking, it will cause a certain someone problems.
Oh, I don't mind.
Yeah, I could care less if people gossip about us now.

How dare she! What a disgraceful attitude towards
Master Shadow!

That girl! She's always disrespectful and over-
familiar with Master Shadow, and now she
gives him chocolates...!

Though she said that she "happened to get hold of
them," her scheming is plain to see.

She's trying to get on Master Shadow's good side by
any means possible... Hehe.

If she thinks she can entice Master Shadow with such
trite methods, then she is a rather shallow person.

After all, Master Shadow doesn't have time to play
lovey-dovey when he's busy battling the Cult
of Diablos.

It's the same for us at Shadow Garden, of course.
Our daily battle with the Cult leaves us too busy
for Valentine's... Too busy for...Valentine...

Her gaze lowers and comes to rest on a book titled
"Easy Chocolate Recipes" lying on the table.

Epsilon can certainly make chocolates, but I wonder
if I can...
Get a grip on yourself, Beta!

Yes! This isn't the time for silliness when we're
coming together to defeat the Cult of Diablos!

To lurk in the darkness and hunt down shadows.
That's the only reason we exist.
She repeats this to herself in a low voice.

But...I bought this recipe book and dressed up nicer
than I usually do...
My actions are contradicting my words.

B-But, seeing as it's Valentine's, even I want to
wear something a little nicer!

Even though I'm doing all this, I'm so full of
excuses that I can't be firm with myself...
I'm so indecisive.

Sigh... I'd hoped to grow into my role, but I haven't
changed at all. I'm still trailing behind Lady Alpha.

Do I curse the princess because I'm jealous that I
can't behave as she does...?

H-Hold on! Why should I be jealous of such a
tasteless hussy? There's absolutely no need!

As quickly as it arose, Beta hastily erases the word
jealous from her mind.

Well, I suppose I'm envious of how much time she gets
to spend with Master Shadow...

I don't regret joining the Shadow Garden, but there
are times that I long for campus life.

If I'd been an ordinary student, Master Shadow...
I mean, if I could've lived on campus with Cid,
maybe my life would be different now.

I might've given him Valentine chocolates and
confessed my love to him after school...

Then we'd go to school everyday as a couple, and on
days off we'd go on dates and hold hands... And in
restaurants decide together what to eat.
Oh, I'd want us to study for tests together too...

Sigh... the more I talk about what-ifs, the more
futile it feels.

Anyway, if I wasn't granted this life as Beta in
the Shadow Garden I'd have rotted away,
possessed by a demon...

Right, time to break out of my fantasy! I think I'll
buy some chocolates from Mitsugoshi and eat
them myself.

It's okay to talk about one's fantasies from time to
time, right?

Suddenly Lady Alpha and Gamma's voices interrupt
Beta's thoughts.

You are always so serious. You want to give Shadow
chocolates, right?
Woah! When did you guys sneak in?!

Right about when you were saying something about
Princess Alexia.

Th-That's almost from the very beginning! Wh-Why
didn't you say something sooner?! I'm so embarrassed.

Hehe, you are dressed so cutely today. It suits
you well.

H-Hey! Don't tease me like that, Lady Alpha!
I'm going to change clothes!

That would be a waste, you haven't shown Shadow yet,
right?

I...I just put this on for the fun of it. I didn't
plan to show it to anyone...

I've got a great idea. Seeing as it's a style for
Valentine's, why not take advantage of it?
Huh...? Gamma, what do you mean?

Valentine's has been quite popular the past few years,
and has firmly established itself in society... Of course
things may get boring.

So, Mitsugoshi has decided to hold an even bigger
campaign this year.
What's that got to do with me?

Well, I'm still working it out, so can we discuss
this in more detail later?
It's a plan that I think even you will enjoy, Beta.
OK, sure...

(What does Gamma have in mind? I'm excited to know,
but also a little scared... Does she want me as a
campaign girl in this outfit?)

(I'm embarrassed to appear in front of people like
this! B-But if Master Shadow was there, then maybe...)

(Also, they said that I looked cute today... Could I
have a chance to get closer to him? Aaahhh!)
Beta...? What are you mumbling about?
N-Nothing!

The town is celebrating Valentine's, so we should
enjoy it as best we can.
Unless...

Do you want to secretly give him the chocolates on
your own? If so, I'm afraid we can't allow it.

Now, now! Did you think you could outwit the Seven
Shadows, Beta?

I-I wouldn't dream of it! Could you both stop ganging
up on me?

Heehee, then it's decided. If Beta plays along, then
this year's Valentine's could be the best one yet.

(I give Master Shadow Valentine chocolates, and pour
out my heart. Then we spend time together, just the
two of us...)
(That's what I long for anyway...)

(But, it might be nice...to enjoy Valentine's with all
of the Seven Shadows.)
